text:
How can I call the same module 3 times in an email template?

Right now, it is pulling all three in, but when I update it in the email builder, only the first one is editable and when I edit that one, it targets all 3 of them.

...do I really need to make repeat modules and call them individually or is there a better way?
Hey <@UFSDNK6VB> Iâ€™m guessing the template is a coded file?  If so make sure when you add the module you give each a unique name
